Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We have some last minute online banner advertisement availability in 2017. I wanted to see if you would be interested in a nice online banner package at a steep discount. I’ve been trying to do more with {!Account.Name}, this could be an option.
If you can move before the end of October, we have 50,000 banner impressions available in November and December. Rate card cost 50k impressions is $6,000 but I can reduce the cost to $3,000. You would have to rotate between two sizes, 300x250 and 728x90 pixels. We’d need materials for both sizes. Specs:
Rectangle Banner 300x250 IMU Files accepted: .jpg, .gif, .png Max file size: 40K Flash and third party tags accepted. Please request additional information for flash. URL link
Leaderboard Website Banner 728x90 Files accepted: .jpg, .gif, .png Max file size: 40K Flash and third party tags accepted. Please request additional information for flash. URL link
Let me know if you are interested or have questions.
-Doug
---------------------------------- Doug Juenemann Director, Advertising Compliance Week doug@complianceweek.com (617) 570 8610
